page.title: 16CARBERRY TOWER
page.content: CARBERRY TOWER IS A VERY OLD HOUSE. THE OLDEST PART,THE TOWER DATES FROM THE FOURTEENTH CENTURY.THE WALLS OF THE TOWER ARE SO THICK THAT THE ROOMS IN IT ARE EXTREMELY COLD BECAUSE THE HEAT OF THE SUN NEVER PENETRATES THEM.IT USED TO BE OWNED BY A VERY WEALTHY NOBLE FAMILY.NOW IT IS OWNED BY THE CHURCH OF SCOTLAND.THEY USE IT AS A CONFERENCE CENTRE FOR GROUPS OF MINISTERS AND ELDERS FROM CHURCHES THROUGHOUT SCOTLAND.THE PEOPLE MEETING THERE DON'T SPEND ALL THEIR TIME IN SERIOUS DISCUSSION.THERE ARE MANY THINGS FOR THEM TO DO IN THEIR SPARE TIME.THEY CAN PLAY TABLE TENNIS,DARTS BILLIARDS AND OTHER SPORTS .THERE ARE TWO LIBRARIES.THEY CAN GO FOR WALKS IN THE BEAUTIFUL GROUNDS IN WHICH THE HOUSE STANDS.THERE IS A CHAPEL WHERE SERVICES ARE HELD.
